1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Metal Central TV features the best upcoming metal/rock/punk music the world has to offer. With new music from legendary Australian band Sydonia and old school classics from Silver Mountain.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Metal Central TV features the best upcoming metal/rock/punk music the world has to offer. With new music from legendary Australian band Sydonia and old school classics from Silver Mountain.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Metal Central TV features the best upcoming metal/rock/punk music the world has to offer. We also take a look behind the scenes of a Sydonia tour.

imdb.plot outline: Metal Central is a TV show featuring the best international metal and rock acts from around the globe. There will be documentaries, tour videos; live concerts from the global independent music scene and of course some of the finest music from the latest metal acts. The show is focussed on providing independent labels and artists from all over the world the opportunity to showcase their work and gain global exposure. If you would like to submit your music, please submit your video link to content.mctv@gmail.com Tune into Metal Central TV at muzu.tv/metalcentraltv for all your edgy rift, hard hitting, and head banging needs.
